Account
sales@uminers.com
+86 (020) 8488 8242

Mining equipment with
delivery across the World

We will deliver equipment from stock or by order from China in a period of 7 days

About delivery

All equipment supplied by Uminers is original and produced by official manufactures such as BITMAIN, MICROBT, and others.

We only conduct legal deliveries and provide supporting documents: Certificate of Conformity and Delivery Contract.

When ordering equipment from China, we deliver it to our office, and then arrange delivery by a transport company to your address.

When placing equipment in our hosting, we independently deliver it to the data center, connect and set it up.

Перейти в каталог

Способы оплаты

Cash

To an employee at the office

By bank card

Payments by requisites

For legal entities
